comments.body: There have been heritage buses on the 15 bus route for years. I worked on the upgrade of bank station (2017-2019) and would see them all the time

comments.author: SleepyTester
comments.body:
I used to love getting a Routemaster from Liverpool St when it was still in regular service back in 2001. Even then it felt like a little slice of London history and something to treasure because it would soon be gone.

Nice to see one working the streets on London today. Iâ€™m surprised (but pleased) tfl are allowed to still use them for actual bus services

comments.author: Vivid_Pink_Clouds
comments.body: I loved being able to hop on and off at will. Can we get that back post Brexit?

comments.author: DistractedByCookies
comments.body: God, they are just so much more charming than modern models. Simply iconic.

comments.body: I love how that station entrance only came into existence two years ago, yet it blends in and looks like it has been there for years.
